languages.text: "Оставь эту мысль. Таким, как ты, нет туда пути. Великая труба создана для путешествий богов, а не смертных. Лишь тот, на ком лежит благословение великого духа Префа, повелителя сей палубы, может подступиться к великой трубе. Но и тогда не ждет его успех — духи великой трубы заперли врата и открывают их лишь тем, кому ведомо божественное слово. А ржавые духи следят, чтобы люди не похитили его, и расправятся с вором".

"Abandon this thought. Your kind can't go in there. The great tube was made for the travels of gods, not mortals. Only one who has the blessing of Pref, the great spirit who rules this deck, may approach the great tube. But even such a one will have tried in vain, for the great tube's spirits have sealed its gate and will only open it to those who know the divine word. And the rust wraiths ensure that humans don't steal the word. They'll make short work of any thief."
languages.original_text: "Оставь эту мысль. Таким, как ты, нет туда пути. Великая труба создана для путешествий богов, а не смертных. Лишь тот, на ком лежит благословение великого духа Префа, повелителя сей палубы, может подступиться к великой трубе. Но и тогда не ждет его успех — духи великой трубы заперли врата и открывают их лишь тем, кому ведомо божественное слово. А ржавые духи следят, чтобы люди не похитили его, и расправятся с вором".

Only one who has the blessing of Pref, the great spirit who rules this deck, may approach the great tube. But even such a one will have tried in vain, for the great tube's spirits have sealed its gate and will only open it to those who know the divine word. And the rust wraiths are making sure humans don't steal the word. They'll make short work of any thief."
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: 「その考えは捨てることだ。お前たちでは行けぬ。巨大チューブは神々が移動するために作られたものであり、人間用ではない。このデッキを支配する大精霊、プレフの恩寵を受けた者だけが巨大チューブに近づくことを許される。しかし、そんな者の試みさえ無駄になるだろう。巨大チューブの精霊が門を封印しているのだ。開けられるのは聖なる言葉を知る者だけ。そしてさびついたレイスが、人間にその言葉をまねられることがないように守っている。どんな盗人だろうと、たちどころに始末するのだから」
languages.original_text: "Abandon this thought. Your kind can't go in there. The great tube was made for the travels of gods, not mortals. Only one who has the blessing of Pref, the great spirit who rules this deck, may approach the great tube. But even such a one will have tried in vain, for the great tube's spirits have sealed its gate and will only open it to those who know the divine word. And the rust wraiths ensure that humans don't steal the word. They'll make short work of any thief."

traits.locale_text: 「その考えは捨てることだ。お前たちでは行けぬ。巨大チューブは神々が移動するために作られたものであり、人間用ではない。このデッキを支配する大精霊、プレフの恩寵を受けた者だけが巨大チューブに近づくことを許される。しかし、そんな者の試みさえ無駄になるだろう。巨大チューブの精霊が門を封印しているのだ。開けられるのは聖なる言葉を知る者だけ。そしてさびついたレイスが、人間にその言葉をまねられることがないように守っている。どんな盗人だろうと、たちどころに始末するのだから」
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: “别异想天开了，你们这些鬼魂是进不去的。那条巨大的管道是为神明的出行而铸造的，凡人无法踏足。只有觐见普雷弗，得到统治这层甲板的伟大神灵的祝福，才能接近那条巨大管道。但即便如此，你也无法进入其中。因为巨大管道中的精魂已经封闭了大门，只有知道神圣咒语的人才能打开。而铁锈冥灵看守着大门，确保凡人无法盗走神圣的咒语。他们会迅速干掉所有窃贼。”
languages.original_text: "Abandon this thought. Your kind can't go in there. The great tube was made for the travels of gods, not mortals. Only one who has the blessing of Pref, the great spirit who rules this deck, may approach the great tube. But even such a one will have tried in vain, for the great tube's spirits have sealed its gate and will only open it to those who know the divine word. And the rust wraiths ensure that humans don't steal the word. They'll make short work of any thief."

traits.locale_text: “算了吧，你们这些鬼魂是进不去的。那条巨大的管道是为神明的出行而铸造的，凡人无法踏足。只有觐见普雷弗，得到统治这层甲板的伟大神灵的祝福，才能接近那条巨大管道。但即便如此，你也无法进入其中。因为巨大管道中的精魂已经封闭了大门，只有知道神圣咒语的人才能打开。而铁锈冥灵看守着大门，确保凡人无法盗走神圣的咒语。他们会迅速干掉所有窃贼。”
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: « N'y pensez pas. Vos semblables ne peuvent y pénétrer. Le grand conduit a été conçu pour transporter les dieux, non les mortels. Pour approcher du grand conduit, il faut bénéficier de la bénédiction de Pref, le grand esprit qui veille sur ce pont, mais même alors, ce serait vain, car les esprits du conduit en ont scellé l'entrée et la porte ne s'ouvrira qu'à ceux qui connaissent le mot divin. Et les spectres de rouille sont chargés d'empêcher les humains de s'emparer du mot. Tout voleur sera réduit en pièces. »
languages.original_text: "Abandon this thought. Your kind can't go in there. The great tube was made for the travels of gods, not mortals. Only one who has the blessing of Pref, the great spirit who rules this deck, may approach the great tube. But even such a one will have tried in vain, for the great tube's spirits have sealed its gate and will only open it to those who know the divine word. And the rust wraiths ensure that humans don't steal the word. They'll make short work of any thief."

traits.locale_text: « N'y pensez pas. Vos semblables ne peuvent y pénétrer. Le grand conduit a été conçu pour transporter les dieux, non les mortels. Pour approcher du grand conduit, il faut bénéficier de la bénédiction de Pref, le grand esprit qui veille sur ce pont, mais même alors, ce serait vain, car les esprits du conduit en ont scellé l'entrée et la porte ne s'ouvrira qu'à ceux qui connaissent le mot divin. Et les spectres de rouille sont chargés d'empêcher les humains de s'emparer du mot. Tout voleur sera réduit en pièces. »
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: «Descarta la idea. Tu gente no puede ir allí. El gran tubo se pensó para que lo atravesasen dioses, no mortales. Solo quien haya recibido la bendición de Pref, el gran espíritu que gobierna en esta cubierta, puede acercarse al tubo. Pero incluso así, no lo conseguirás, pues los espíritus del gran tubo han sellado su puerta y solo se abrirá a aquellos que conozcan la palabra divina. Los espectros del óxido se aseguran de que los humanos no se hagan con la palabra y eliminarán a cualquiera que intente robársela».
languages.original_text: "Abandon this thought. Your kind can't go in there. The great tube was made for the travels of gods, not mortals. Only one who has the blessing of Pref, the great spirit who rules this deck, may approach the great tube. But even such a one will have tried in vain, for the great tube's spirits have sealed its gate and will only open it to those who know the divine word. And the rust wraiths ensure that humans don't steal the word. They'll make short work of any thief."

traits.locale_text: «Olvídalo. Los de tu especie no pueden ir allí. El gran tubo se pensó para que lo atravesasen dioses, no mortales. Solo quien haya recibido la bendición de Pref, el gran espíritu que gobierna en esta cubierta, puede acercarse al tubo. Pero incluso así, no lo conseguirás, pues los espíritus del gran tubo han sellado su puerta y solo se abrirá a aquellos que conozcan la palabra divina. Los espectros del óxido se aseguran de que los humanos no se hagan con la palabra y eliminarán a cualquiera que intente robársela».
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: "Verwerft diesen Gedanken. Euresgleichen darf dort nicht hinein. Die große Röhre wurde für die Reisen von Göttern erschaffen, nicht von Sterblichen. Nur, wer den Segen von Präf genießt, dem großen Geist, der über dieses Deck herrscht, darf sich der großen Röhre nähern. Doch selbst jene werden es umsonst versucht haben, denn die Geister der großen Röhre haben ihr Tor versiegelt und öffnen es nur für jene, die das göttliche Wort kennen. Und die Rostgeister stellen sicher, dass Menschen das Wort das nicht stehlen. Sie machen kurzen Prozess mit jedem Dieb."
languages.original_text: "Abandon this thought. Your kind can't go in there. The great tube was made for the travels of gods, not mortals. Only one who has the blessing of Pref, the great spirit who rules this deck, may approach the great tube. But even such a one will have tried in vain, for the great tube's spirits have sealed its gate and will only open it to those who know the divine word. And the rust wraiths ensure that humans don't steal the word. They'll make short work of any thief."

traits.locale_text: "Vergesst es. Euresgleichen darf dort nicht hinein. Die große Röhre wurde für die Reisen von Göttern erschaffen, nicht von Sterblichen. Nur, wer den Segen von Präf genießt, dem großen Geist, der über dieses Deck herrscht, darf sich der großen Röhre nähern. Doch selbst jene werden es umsonst versucht haben, denn die Geister der großen Röhre haben ihr Tor versiegelt und öffnen es nur für jene, die das göttliche Wort kennen. Und die Rostgeister stellen sicher, dass Menschen das Wort das nicht stehlen. Sie machen kurzen Prozess mit jedem Dieb."
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: "Bu düşünceyi aklından sil. Türünüz oraya giremez. Ulu tüp, tanrıların kullanması için yapılmıştır. Ölümlüler kullanamaz. Yalnızca bu güverteye hükmeden ulu ruh Pref'in kutsamasına sahipler ona yaklaşabilir. Ancak öyleleri bile boşa emek sarf etmiş olur zira ulu tüpün ruhları, onu kilitlemiş olup yalnızca ilahi kelamı bilenlere açarlar. Pas tayfları; insanların kelamı çalmasını engeller, hırsızları hızla bertaraf ederler."
languages.original_text: "Abandon this thought. Your kind can't go in there. The great tube was made for the travels of gods, not mortals. Only one who has the blessing of Pref, the great spirit who rules this deck, may approach the great tube. But even such a one will have tried in vain, for the great tube's spirits have sealed its gate and will only open it to those who know the divine word. And the rust wraiths ensure that humans don't steal the word. They'll make short work of any thief."

traits.locale_text: "Bu düşünceyi aklından sil. Türünüz oraya giremez. Ulu tüp, tanrıların kullanması için yapılmıştır, ölümlülerin değil. Yalnızca bu güverteyi yöneten ulu ruh Pref'in kutsamasına sahip olanlar ulu tüpe yaklaşabilir. Ancak öyle biri bile boşa emek sarf etmiş olur çünkü ulu tüpün ruhları, kapısını kilitlemişlerdir ve yalnızca ilahi kelamı bilenlere açarlar. Pas tayfları, insanların kelamı çalmasını engeller, hırsızları hızla bertaraf ederler."
traits.speaker: Chief
